original: 廬江人，東吳官員。長於天文曆算，曾做渾天儀，又編寫《乾象曆》。於政事上，幾次作為使臣出使蜀漢、西晉。但因剛正耿直，加上奸佞饞言，被孫皓所殺。
text: Lujiang people, Soochow officials. He is better than astronomical calendar calculation, once made an armillary sphere, and wrote "Qianxiang Calendar". In political affairs, he served as an envoy to Shuhan and Western Jin Dynasty several times. However, Sun Hao was killed by Sun Hao because of his uprightness and treacherous words.
